description: Implement technical policies to allow only authorized access
Implement hardware/software mechanisms to record and examine ePHI activity
Establish procedures for emergency ePHI access
Implement policies to ensure ePHI is not improperly altered
Implement electronic mechanisms to corroborate ePHI not altered
Implement procedures to verify person/entity seeking access
Implement technical security measures for ePHI transmission
Implement security measures ensuring transmitted ePHI not improperly modified
Implement mechanism to encrypt ePHI during transmission
